statements: SELECT * FROM GreenTechnologyStoreInventory;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM GreenTechnologyStoreInventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM GreenTechnologyStoreInventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM GreenTechnologyStoreInventory WHERE category='Laptops' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM GreenTechnologyStoreInventory WHERE price < 500.00;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM GreenTechnologyStoreInventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM GreenTechnologyStoreInventory WHERE category = 'Laptops' ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM GreenTechnologyStoreInventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY category, price;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM GreenTechnologyStoreInventory WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY quantity DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM GreenTechnologyStoreInventory GROUP BY category HAVING SUM(quantity) > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM eco_products;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM eco_products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_quantity FROM eco_products WHERE product_price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price, product_quantity FROM eco_products WHERE product_quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM eco_products ORDER BY product_price DESC, product_quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_price, product_quantity FROM eco_products WHERE product_quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_quantity DESC;

SELECT product_name, product_quantity, transaction_date FROM eco_products JOIN transactions ON eco_products.product_id = transactions.product_id WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT SUM(product_price * product_quantity) AS total_revenue FROM eco_products;

SELECT product_name, transaction_type, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transaction_amount FROM eco_products JOIN transactions ON eco_products.product_id = transactions.product_id GROUP BY product_name, transaction_type ORDER BY total_transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductInventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM ProductInventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold FROM SalesHistory WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProductInventory WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductInventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM ProductInventory WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT SaleHistory.sale_date, ProductInventory.product_name, SaleHistory.quantity_sold FROM SalesHistory JOIN ProductInventory ON SalesHistory.product_id = ProductInventory.product_id WHERE SaleHistory.quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY SaleHistory.sale_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS product_count FROM Suppliers JOIN ProductInventory ON Suppliers.supplier_id = ProductInventory.product_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM eco_products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM eco_products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address, contact_person FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE membership_level = 'Gold' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, total_price FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM eco_products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM eco_products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE membership_level ='Gold' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity_in_stock FROM eco_products WHERE quantity_in_stock < 100 ORDER BY quantity_in_stock ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM Products WHERE product_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_id, category_id FROM ProductCategories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, supplier_contact DESC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(stock_id) AS total_stock FROM Stock GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_stock > 10;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, product_description, product_price FROM Products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_address FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_address LIKE '%Street%';

SELECT product_name, category_name FROM Products JOIN ProductCategories ON Products.product_id = ProductCategories.product_id JOIN Categories ON ProductCategories.category_id = Categories.category_id;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Products JOIN Stock ON Products.product_id = Stock.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 50;
